scripts.cruise: npx depcruise src --include-only "^src" --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg > graph/dependency-graph.svg
scripts.cruise:html: npx depcruise src --include-only "^src" --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg | tee graph/dependency-cruiser-dir-graph.svg | graph/depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > dependency-graph.html
scripts.cruise:ddot: npx depcruise src --include-only "^src" --config --output-type ddot | dot -T svg -Grankdir=TD > graph/dependency-graph.svg
scripts.cruise:archi: npx depcruise src --include-only "^src" --config --output-type archi | dot -T svg -Grankdir=TD > graph/dependency-graph.svg
